name: @harperdb/mqtt-broker-interop-plugin
description: Harper plugin to expand internal MQTT broker with interopability features.

scripts.test: node --test test/config-loader.test.js test/sync-engine.test.js test/bigquery-client.test.js test/generator.test.js test/multi-table-orchestrator.test.js
scripts.test:coverage: node --test --experimental-test-coverage test/config-loader.test.js test/sync-engine.test.js test/bigquery-client.test.js test/generator.test.js test/multi-table-orchestrator.test.js
